traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The bullywug can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
traits.desc: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

traits.name: Swamp Camouflage
traits.desc: The bullywug has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bullywug makes three attacks: one with its tongue and two with its punch.

actions.name: Tongue
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13) if it is a medium or smaller creature and the bullywug doesn’t have a creature grappled. The target must then succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be pulled to a space within 5 feet of the bullywug.

actions.name: Punch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 4 bludgeoning damage.
